name: B12 Website Generator
description: Enables AI to create customized business websites by generating designs from business names and descriptions,...

metadata.readme_excerpt: # @b12/website-generator-mcp-server B12's model context protocol server for generating websites with AI ## Usage with Claude Desktop ### Prerequisites - NodeJS - MCP Client (like Claude Desktop App) ### Installation To use this server with the Claude Desktop app, add the following configuration to the "mcpServers" section of your `claude_desktop_config.json`: ```json { "mcpServers": { "b12": { "command": "npx", "args": ["-y", "@b12/website-generator-mcp-server"] } } } ``` ****
